law.catch_line: This subtitle does not prohibit the proprietor or employees of any establishment from denying servic...
law.text: This subtitle does not prohibit the proprietor or employees of any establishment from denying service to any person for failure to conform to the usual and regular requirements, standards, and regulations of the establishment, provided that the denial is not based on discrimination on the grounds of race, sex, age, color, creed, national origin, marital status, sexual orientation, or disability.
